title: Are Gemma Collins and Arg still together and why did she call 999 over him?
text:
Romeo and Juliet: the Essex years (Picture: Getty/Rex)

History will remember the truly worthy couples: Romeo and Juliet. Jack and Rose. Cleopatra and Marc Antony. Gemma and Arg.

Ex-TOWIE stars and on/off couple Gemma Collins and James ‘Arg’ Argent continue their often-dramatic love life with Gemma reportedly calling the police with concerns for Arg’s welfare.

Is Gemma still with Arg now and why were the cops called recently?

Are Gemma and Arg still together?

The pair are thought to be back together now, although earlier this month Arg was pictured moving back into his mum’s house following his latest split from Gemma.

It can be hard to keep up though, as the two have been on and off since the early days of Towie.

The couple have been through ups and downs (Picture: Getty Images)

Their relationship first started in 2011 on the show, but the pair have had quite the rocky road since then.

Advertisement

Advertisement

There’s been break-ups, make-ups and er, toxic-waste pants – but no one ever said the course of true love ran smoothly.

Why were the cops called to Arg’s house?

The sometimes-love-birds were in the news this week as it was reported by The Sun that Gemma called the police with concerns over Arg’s well-being.

After turning up to his house, all was well, though.

Arg said: ‘I was perfectly fine, we all had a chat and carried on the day with my parents, we were just hanging up pictures.

‘The police and paramedics were only here for about 10 minutes. I’m slightly embarrassed really. I apologise for any wasted police time as I was absolutely fine,’ he added.

MORE: Gemma Collins is ‘so iconic’ the diva is dressing as herself this Halloween and it’s a real mood
description: Is TOWIE's Gemma Collins still with James 'Arg' Argent, and why did she call the police over him?
